name: Blaziken
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to Blaziken. This attack does 80 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Cresselia
Attack1Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, remove 2 damage counters from Cresselia.
Attack2Text: You may discard 2 Energy attached to Cresselia. If you do, remove all damage counters from 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Darkrai
Attack1Text: Search your deck for an Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Cresselia, this attack's base damage is 100.

name: Darkrai
Attack1Text: You may have your opponent switch the Defending Pokemon with 1 or his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Asleep, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage. If the Defending Pokemon is not Asleep, that Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Pachirisu
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 3 Basic Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has a Pokemon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage. Discard that Pokemon Tool card, look at your opponent's hand, and discard any Pokemon Tool cards of the same name you find there.

name: Porygon-Z
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a basic Energy card from your hand. Porygon-Z is the same type as that Energy Card until the end of your turn. This power can't be used if Porygon-Z is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

name: Rotom
Attack1Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at that card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Sceptile
AbilityText: Each basic Grass Energy card attached to your Grass Pokemon provides GrassGrass Energy instead. You can't use more than 1 Wild Growth Poke-Body each turn.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Swampert
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Water or Fighting Energy attached to 1 of your Benched Pokemon to your Active Pokemon. This power can't be used if Swampert is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Discard the top card from your opponent's deck.

name: Tangrowth
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage for each basic Energy card attached to Tangrowth to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Remove 3 damage counters from Tangrowth. The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Togekiss
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you play Togekiss from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may look at the top 10 cards of your deck, choose as many basic Energy cards as you like, and attach them to your Pokemon in any way you like. Put the other cards back on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage. If tails, remove 3 damage counters from Togekiss.

name: Altaria
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Altaria by attacks from your opponent's Evolved Pokemon is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Beedrill
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage times the number of Beedrill you have in play.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Butterfree
Attack1Text: After your attack, remove from 1 of your Pokemon the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Claydol
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose up to 2 cards from your hand and put them on the bottom of your deck in any order. If you do, draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand. This power can't be used if Claydol is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Dialga
Attack1Text: Draw a card.
Attack2Text: You may return all Energy cards attached to Dialga to your hand. If you do, remove the highest Stage Evolution card from the Defending Pokemon and shuffle that card into your opponent's deck.

name: Exploud
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If the first coin is heads, this attack does 50 damage to the Defending Pokemon. If the first coin is tails, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) If the second coin is heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused. If the second coin is tails, your opponent can't play any Trainer, Supporter, or Stadium cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.

name: Houndoom
Attack1Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.
Attack2Text: You may discard a Fire or Darkness Energy attached to Houndoom. If you discard a Fire Energy, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned. If you discard a Darkness Energy, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Hypno
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Asleep, move all damage counters from Hypno to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Kingler
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon would be be Knocked Out by this attack, Kingler does 30 damage to itself.

name: Lapras
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Pokemon Tool Card, a Supporter card, and a basic Energy card, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Latias
Attack1Text: Remove 2 damage counters and all Special Conditions from Latias.
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy and a Water Energy attached to Latias.

name: Latios
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to Latios. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Discard 3 Energy attached to Latios.

name: Mawile
Attack1Text: Choose 1 face-down Prize card (yours or your opponent's) and put it face up. If that card is a Supporter card, use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack. (That card remains face up for the rest of the game.)
Attack2Text: During your next turn, if an attack does damage to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does 20 more damage.

name: Milotic
AbilityText: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Milotic by your opponent's Pokemon LV.X.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If both are tails, this attack does nothing. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Palkia
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Stadium card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. If there is any Stadium card in play, discard it.
Attack2Text: You may flip a coin. If heads, discard all Energy attached to Palkia and put the Defending Pokemon and all cards attached to it on top of your opponent's deck. Your opponent shuffles his or her deck afterward.

name: Primeape
AbilityText: If Primeape has any damage counters on it, Primeape's attacks do 40 more damage to the Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Primeape is now Confused. Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Slowking
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if any of your Pokemon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Slowking's Psych Up attack's base damage is 60.

name: Unown [H]
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Unown H, Unown E, Unown A, and Unown L on your Bench, you may remove all Special Conditions from 1 of your Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Discard a card from your hand. (If you can't discard a card from your hand, this attack does nothing.)

name: Wailord
AbilityText: As long as Wailord remains Asleep between turns, remove 1 damage counter from Wailord.
Attack1Text: If Wailord has any damage counters on it, Wailord is now Asleep.

name: Weezing
AbilityText: At any time between turns, each player puts 1 more damage counter on his or her Poisoned Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.

name: Wigglytuff
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Each Active Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's) is now Asleep. This power can't be used if Wigglytuff is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If Igglybuff is anywhere under Wigglytuff, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Arbok
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Poisoned, this attack does 10 damage plus 40 more damage. If the Defending Pokemon is not Poisoned, that Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Cacturne
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Combusken
Attack1Text: During your next turn, each of Combusken's attacks does 30 more damage to the Defending Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Delibird
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Floatzel
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Floatzel during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Gorebyss
Attack1Text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with 1 of the Defending Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to the new Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If Gorebyss has any Psychic Energy attached to it, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Granbull
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Granbull.

name: Grovyle
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Grass Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Hariyama
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage.
Attack2Text: If Hariyama has fewer remaining HP than the Defending Pokemon, this attack's base damage is 80.

name: Huntail
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon can't attack or retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: If Huntail has any Darkness Energy attached to it, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage and discard a Special Energy card, if any, attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Linoone
Attack1Text: Move a Pokemon Tool card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon to another of your opponent's Pokemon (excluding Pokemon that already has a Pokemon Tool attached to it). (If an effect of this attack is prevented, this attack does nothing.)
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Loudred
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Magcargo
AbilityText: Magcargo can't be Asleep or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: You may discard the top card of your deck. If you do, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Marshtomp
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon and 10 damage to each of your opponent's other Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Metapod
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Metapod is your Active Pokemon, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card that evolves from Metapod and put it onto Metapod. (This counts as evolving Metapod.) Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Metapod is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Pelipper
Attack1Text: Choose up to 2 basic Water Energy cards from your hand and attach them to Pelipper. Remove 2 damage counters for each Energy card attached in this way.
Attack2Text: Does 30 times the number of Energy cards attached to Pelipper. Then, put all Energy cards attached to Pelipper on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Porygon2
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Supporter card from your hand and use the effect of that card as the effect of this power. This power can't be used if Porygon2 is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Purugly
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

name: Relicanth
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 3 Trainer Cards that have Fossil in their names, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Both Relicanth and the Defending Pokemon are now Asleep.

name: Seviper
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't play any Trainer cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Skarmory
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Skarmory by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Slowbro
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Togetic
Attack2Text: Your opponent may draw a card.

name: Unown [F]
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Unown F is on your Bench, you may use this power. Put a coin next to your Active Pokemon without showing your opponent and cover it with your hand. Your opponent guesses if the coin is heads or tails. If he or she is wrong, draw a card.
Attack1Text: You may flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, this attack's base damage is 30.

name: Unown [G]
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Unown G is on your Bench, you may discard all cards attached to Unown G and attach Unown G to 1 of your Pokemon as a Pokemon Tool card. As long as Unown G is attached to a Pokemon, prevent all effects of attacks, excluding damage, done to that Pokemon.
Attack1Text: If Unown G has any damage counters on it, this attack's base damage is 10.

name: Wailmer
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Zangoose
Attack2Text: If your opponent has Seviper in play, this attack does 40 damage plus 50 more damage.

name: Baltoy
Attack1Text: If you have less cards in your hand than your opponent, draw cards until you have the same number of cards as your opponent. (If you have more or the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does nothing.)
Attack2Text: Switch Baltoy with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Cacnea
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Caterpie
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Caterpie is your Active Pokemon, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card that evolves from Caterpie and put it onto Caterpie. (This counts as evolving Caterpie.) Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Caterpie is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Clamperl
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Drowzee
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Ekans
Attack1Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Ekans.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Feebas
Attack2Text: Search your deck for an Evolution card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Glameow
Attack1Text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with 1 of the Defending Pokemon.

name: Houndour
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Houndour.

name: Igglybuff
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Jigglypuff from your hand onto Igglybuff (this counts as evolving Igglybuff) and remove all damage counters from Igglybuff.
Attack1Text: Draw a card. If you didn't play any Supporter card from your hand during this turn, draw 2 more cards.

name: Illumise
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Grass Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Illumise is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Poke-Bodies, that Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Jigglypuff
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Jigglypuff by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Kakuna
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Kakuna by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Koffing
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Lunatone
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a card from your hand. Then, if you have Solrock in play, draw a card. This power can't be used if Lunatone is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: You may discard any Stadium card in play.

name: Luvdisc
Attack1Text: Reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand. If that card is a Pokemon, draw 2 cards.
Attack2Text: If Luvdisc and the Defending Pokemon have the same amount of Energy attached to them, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Makuhita
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Mankey
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Mankey.

name: Mudkip
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Porygon
Attack1Text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back on top of your deck in any order.

name: Slowpoke
Attack1Text: Remove all Special Conditions and 3 damage counters from Slowpoke. Slowpoke is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Slowpoke can't attack during your next turn.

name: Slugma
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Snubbull
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Solrock
AbilityText: If you have Lunatone in play, damage done to your opponent's Pokemon by your Psychic or Fighting Pokemon isn't affected by resistance.
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Swablu
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Swablu during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Tangela
Attack1Text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with 1 of the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Colorless Energy in the Defending Pokemon's Retreat Cost (after applying effects to the the Retreat Cost).

name: Togepi
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokemon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Torchic
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Treecko
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Treecko but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.
Attack2Text: Remove 1 damage counter from Treecko.

name: Unown [L]
AbilityText: Unown L can use any attack from any Unown in play (both yours and your opponent's). (You still have to pay for that attack's Energy cost.)
Attack1Text: Search either player's discard pile for up to any 2 cards, show them to your opponent, and put them on top of that player's deck in any order you like.

name: Volbeat
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Illumise in play, you may search your discard pile for a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck. This power can't be used if Volbeat is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Weedle
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Whismur
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Zigzagoon
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for any 1 card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
